### Data Import

```{python}
data_2011 = pd.read_csv("data_files//all_data_M_2011.csv",nrows=1000)

data_2013 = pd.read_csv("data_files//all_data_M_2013.csv",nrows=1000)
data_2014 = pd.read_csv("data_files//all_data_M_2014.csv",nrows=1000)
data_2015 = pd.read_csv("data_files//all_data_M_2015.csv",nrows=1000)
data_2016 = pd.read_csv("data_files//all_data_M_2016.csv",nrows=1000)
data_2017 = pd.read_csv("data_files//all_data_M_2017.csv",nrows=1000)
data_2018 = pd.read_csv("data_files//all_data_M_2018.csv",nrows=1000)
data_2019 = pd.read_csv("data_files//all_data_M_2019.csv",nrows=1000)
```

```{python}
data = [data_2011, data_2012, data_2013, data_2014, data_2015, data_2016, data_2017,data_2018, data_2019, data_2020, data_2021, data_2022, data_2023]
```

### Data Cleaning

```{python}
selcols = ["occ_code","occ_title","tot_emp","a_mean","a_median"]

year = 2011
for i in range(len(data)):
  df = data[i]
  df.columns = df.columns.str.lower()
  df.columns = df.columns.str.replace(' ', '_')
  df = df.loc[:,selcols]
  df["year"] = year
  data[i] = df
  year += 1
```

```{python}
combined_df = data[0]
for i in range(1,len(data)):
  combined_df = pd.concat([combined_df,data[i]])
```
